data.prayer: Father, let your Word be a lamp to the feet of the 1,412,161 believers in Nueva Ecija, Philippines.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nueva Ecija, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,412,161 believers in the state of Nueva Ecija with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Nueva Ecija. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Nueva Ecija, Philippines.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,412,161 believers in the state of Nueva Ecija.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Nueva Ecija, Philippines a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Nueva Ecija, Philippines has a population of 10,137,700.

We estimate Nueva Ecija has 1,412,161 people who might know Jesus, 7,809,628 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 915,911 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Nueva Ecija, Philippines will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
